rooms.description: An inviting entrance area with a small foyer for reception, incorporating local decor and Vastu principles ensuring the main entrance faces east.
Spacious living room designed for comfort and industrial aesthetics with exposed beams, a modern farmhouse charm, and ample natural light. Positioned to the south as per Vastu guidelines.
Modern kitchen integrated into the living space with an open layout ensuring smooth flow, adhering to local building norms and efficient ventilation.
A dedicated library space with ample shelving for books and a cozy reading nook. Designed in the west direction per Vastu for concentration and learning.
Spacious master bedroom with an attached balcony. The bedroom is designed in a north-east direction following Vastu principles to promote health and tranquility.
